Class FXMLMenuManager

java.lang.Object
bomberman.bomberman.FXMLMenuManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommandsController.CommandsCallback, MainMenuController.MenuNavigationCallback, PauseMenuController.PauseMenuCallback, ProfileMenuController.ProfileMenuCallback, ThemeMenuController.ThemeMenuCallback
public class FXMLMenuManager extends Object implements MainMenuController.MenuNavigationCallback, PauseMenuController.PauseMenuCallback, ThemeMenuController.ThemeMenuCallback, CommandsController.CommandsCallback, ProfileMenuController.ProfileMenuCallback
Gestionnaire centralisé pour tous les menus FXML du jeu Bomberman.
